description:
Want to build your own internet of things kegerator? We did!

Hear how we assembled and powered a kegerator with a Beagle Bone Black (Debian Linux), an RFID reader, an LCD readout and a custom web admin GUI (node.js, backbone, bonescript, etc).

This system includes user identification (via RFID card), a Slack notification bot and pour rate limiting.

The Kegerator will sadly not be present

GitHub code: https://github.com/atomantic/kegiot

Slides:
http://bit.ly/kegiot
title: LinuxFest Northwest 2016: DIY IoT Kegerator
